title: FF Info Specimen
content:
I’m trying to dig up a PDF speciman for FF Info. No luck so far. I cant find an address for Eric S. Would anyone have such a thing, or could you point me to it? Showing a client 12 point gifs from a website doesnt quite cut it. ;)

 [‹ Windows Font Managment Software?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821144030/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12564 "Go to previous forum topic") [Why you like type. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821144030/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15824 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
An email to the foundry usually does the trick. ;)

That said, we are working hard to get PDF specimens up on both fontfont.com and fontshop.com. You should see them very soon.

Shoot me some text and I’ll PDF it for you.
I actually did leave David a voicemail, and emailed him a few days back. No word, yet. (thanks for the pdf)

Im always in for word of a good beating. ;)  
(he emailed me today, does that mean he was beaten?) ;)

A gentleman does not spank & tell.

hhp
A gentleman does not get spanked and tell.

I was going to write “A lady does not spank & tell”.  
But Stephen and David are men. I presume.

hhp
